text.section:
A civil money penalty imposed under this section for potential for more than minimal harm deficiencies:
May not exceed $10,000 per instance; or
May not exceed $1,000 per day for an ongoing pattern of deficiencies until the nursing home is in compliance.

A civil money penalty imposed under this subtitle for actual harm deficiencies:
May not exceed $10,000 per instance; or
May not exceed $5,000 per day for an ongoing pattern of deficiencies until the nursing home is in compliance.

A civil money penalty imposed under this section for a serious and immediate threat:
May not exceed $10,000 per instance; or
May not exceed $10,000 per day for an ongoing pattern of deficiencies until the nursing home is in compliance.
